website_summaries.verdict: A kit for decorating T-shirts and other fabric products that provides a lot of fun for a low price.
pros: 8 sheets of stencils provide a good variety of pattern options
cons: Kit does not include a T-shirt for the child

customer_reviews.title: Great for american girl party activity!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. Great for crafting with the kiddos. We used it as part of American Girl theme birthday party . My daughter and guests enjoyed the stamps and stencils . I enjoyed that it came with a shirt to decorate. helpful hint since it was for a party with multiple kids I also purchased 18 inch doll shirts to decorate which worked well with this kit. plenty left over and we can still use for future shirt decorating even decorating a kid size T (which we did as well)
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer M.

customer_reviews.title: I am seriously super duper bummed that the ink pads were COMPLETELY dried ...
customer_reviews.text: I am seriously super duper bummed that the ink pads were COMPLETELY dried up! VERY disappointing!!! Ink pads r pricey, especially when u need to buy several of them! I am so glad I checked them before my dgt's bday, so off to the craft store I go to buy ink pads! UGH! The shirts r kinda small n not soft. I found some super soft colored ones here on Amazon instead. The stamps r crappy too, but some real ones at the craft store along w/ ink pads lol! All-in-all don't waste ur money on this. #SuperBummed
customer_reviews.author: Elisa A.

customer_reviews.title: Definitely the perfect gift for a little girl
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my niece and she went nuts! It comes with the ink pads,stencils markers and 2 shirts for a DOLL. i bought my niece a plan white shirt to go with it and as soon as she got home she went to work making matching shirts for her and her doll. She couldn't wait to call me and tell me that she used it. Since then she's also designed her own book bag. Definitely the perfect gift for a little girl!
customer_reviews.author: Jestine w

customer_reviews.title: A little disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I'm a little disappointed with this kit. The doll shirts and stencils are nice, but the fabric paint and applicators are a challenge. The applicators are small, and the paint has to be rubbed quite a bit onto the fabric to show up. My great a granddaughter got a little frustrated with the process. You will definitely need a sturdy piece of cardboard to put inside the shirt while applying, and tape to hold the stencil in place. FYI, there is no child size shirt included in this set.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute Gift!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very cute kit. My daughter was very excited to decorate a short for her AG Doll. The only reason I didn't give 5 stars was due to the fact that the do not include a shirt in a child size to match. Overall very cute product though. Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: New Mama LJ

customer_reviews.title: Very Deceiving
customer_reviews.text: The advertising is very deceiving. i bought this for a 9 year old thinking she could make a shirt for herself that matched her American Girl doll. It does not come with a shirt for the older girl, there are only 2 little shirts for the doll.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey HS

customer_reviews.title: Good idea but cheap product
customer_reviews.text: My 7 year old niece made the best of it but this kit leaves a lot to be desired. The ink pads are too small and do not have enough ink to even begin to use them on the stencils. Great idea but product is just too cheaply made
customer_reviews.author: Katrina FreedTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fun project, but the kit only includes a white tee shirt for the doll -not for the child.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: American Girl T - shirt  stamping kit
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my great niece ( she is 8 ), and loves anything American Girl. Very nice product, she couldn't wait to try it. Just wish there were more inside the package.
customer_reviews.author: Great uncle-Steven S.

customer_reviews.title: fun
customer_reviews.text: my daughter and I had a good tine with this craft. I somehow washed it all off...maybe I should have hand washed? but I don;t do that
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Keil

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift
customer_reviews.text: This didn't stay in the box long! I ordered two T-Shirts for the happy little recipient so that there was no delay in creating her masterpieces! What a great gift for this 8 year old...her 10 year old sister got into the act too!
customer_reviews.author: Annie R.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Super cute idea! Granddaughter jumped right in without hesitation and loved it!!
customer_reviews.author: Diana W

customer_reviews.title: Look cute
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my niece who is soon to be six. She is really getting into AmericanGirl and loves to do things with her doll so I think she will enjoy making shirts for the two of them.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: So excited to try these. The reviews online helped ...
customer_reviews.text: So excited to try these. The reviews online helped to clarify that the box only includes tshirts for the dolls.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea S.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fun craft project, we also two white tee shirts in our Granddaughters size, so she can match her dolls.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: My god daughter loved this item
customer_reviews.text: My god daughter loved this item. So easy for kids to use and I don't have to watch like a hawk afraid she'll get messy.
customer_reviews.author: Brytanie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This one was a great present for granddaughter. She absolutely love it
customer_reviews.author: Rob M

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and complicated.  Do not recommend.
customer_reviews.text: I want my money back. The decorations are complicated and not easy to follow. The ink was old and dry. It was not fun for either my 11 year old granddaughter or me!
customer_reviews.author: P Jay Peterson

customer_reviews.title: yes
customer_reviews.text: fun gift for young girls. like craft items as gifts.
customer_reviews.author: me

customer_reviews.title: Grand daughter loved it. Only wish it came with a t-shirt ...
customer_reviews.text: Grand daughter loved it. Only wish it came with a t-shirt that grand daughter could make for herself to wear so that she could match her doll.
customer_reviews.author: Linda K Jones

customer_reviews.title: Fyi
customer_reviews.text: It dosent come with a shirt for the child, just two for the doll.
customer_reviews.author: Shelby K.

customer_reviews.title: Not satisfied
customer_reviews.text: When product arrived, box was torn and taped together, also there were two doll size t-shirts in the box instead of one child T-shirt and one doll T-shirt
customer_reviews.author: T. Simmons

customer_reviews.title: although i new it came with 2 doll shirts it ...
customer_reviews.text: although i new it came with 2 doll shirts it shows on the box a doll and a girl so my daughter was upset when she found out that she could mke herself a shirt and a couple of inks were dry
customer_reviews.author: melody

customer_reviews.title: Missing a stencil
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my niece's that are like best friends. They were so excited they wanted to create them right away. Upon opening them they noticed one of them did not have the stencil in the box. Luckily they shared the other stencil.
customer_reviews.author: Keara

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Super cute! But dont let the box fool you...there isnt a kid sized shirt in there
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My niece loved it! She made such a cute shirt
customer_reviews.text: My niece loved it! She made such a cute shirt.
customer_reviews.author: Mother of four

customer_reviews.title: SO CUTE!  Excellent poduct!  I can't wait to see my daughter & her American Doll in it!
customer_reviews.text: I brought this for my 8 year old granddaughter who has a collection of American Dolls and their furniture. She was immediately IN LOVE with this and couldn't wait to make the teeshirts; but as to date she has not been able to do it as she aspires to become a DESIGNER and can't make up her mind which design she wants to use. However, it is a quality, fun, and fantastic product and I'm sure she will convince me to continue buying this product until all her American Dolls have a t-shirt designed by HER!!!
customer_reviews.author: Iris

product_meta.title: American Girl Stamping T-Shirt Design Kit
product_meta.description:
Create and design t-shirts for you and your doll with the American Girl T-shirt Design Kit by Fashion Angels!

Use the stencils to make intricate designs or create custom artwork with the fun-shaped stamps and decorate your finished products with the black fabric marker.

Set includes 2 doll t-shirts, stamps, ink pads, stencil sheets, fabric marker and instructional design guide.
feature_bullets: DESIGN T-SHIRTS for you and your doll!
CREATE CUSTOM ARTWORK with stencils, fun shaped stamps and a black fabric marker
SET INCLUDES 2 doll t-shirts, 8 stencil sheets, 6 stamps, 6 ink pads, fabric marker and design instructions
RECOMMENDED for young designers 8 years and up

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars47 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
